Everything is going to be safe today and tomorrow the situation will be finished, said Zahi Hawass , also a National Geographic Society explorer-in-residence.( The National Geographic Society owns National Geographic Society News.) Cher Lloyd remains very grateful to Simon Cowell for giving her a chance on the show and signing her to his Syco label. And she denied reports the pair have clashed over her artistic path, adding: I wouldn't be here without him. Simon Cowell gets me and he's got my back. He knows me too well to give me rules- he likes the fact I'm a bit rebellious! It is amazing just how self-confident Cher Lloyd appears in the super-slick surroundings of LA.
